fieldUpdates.description: This will update the Contract Status in CFS on the case layout for Entitlements
fieldUpdates.name: Contract Status in CFS

fieldUpdates.description: First Contact Field Update on Contact Completed
fieldUpdates.name: First Contact Field Update

fieldUpdates.description: Moves Case from Global Entitlements Accenture Rep to Entitlements Queue for Reassignment
fieldUpdates.name: Move to Entitlement Queue

fieldUpdates.description: Update RT from SF Global Support to Hospitality Namer Direct
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case RT -HOSP Direct

fieldUpdates.description: This field will update a field the field, which will be used to send escalation notification to case owner and his/her manager
fieldUpdates.name: Update Immediate Case Escalated

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( OR(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Now())) = 5,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Now())) = 6, WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Now())) = 7), Now() + 4, IF(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Now())) = 1 , Now() + 3, Now()+2) )
fieldUpdates.name: Update Immediate Case Escalated Date

fieldUpdates.description: This will update Immediate Detractor Case Escalated Field which will be used to send notification to case owner for "Immediate" and "Immediate and Detractor" Case type
fieldUpdates.name: Update Immediate Detractor Case Escalate

fieldUpdates.description: This workflow will update Immediate Detractor Case Escalated date.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Immediate Detractor Case Escalate
Update Is Child Case Escalated Field
Update Is Due date Passed Field

fieldUpdates.description: Updates Last Modified Date on Case by updating Last Activity Date field.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Last Activity Date on Case
VOC Assigned to Banking CSM Queue.

outboundMessages.description: Outbound Message to Qualtrics invoked by a record triggered flow for Hospitality Support Case Record Type. (Added manually)
outboundMessages.name: Invoke Qualtrics Hospitality Survey

outboundMessages.description: EBA_SF-1499:CCAD: Create Workflow to trigger Dispute Resolution Survey from Qualtrics
outboundMessages.name: Send Dispute Case to Qualtrics

rules.fullName: 1%2E1 Notify all queue member when queue is owner of child case
rules.description: Send email to all queue member of a queue when queue is owner of child case(Follow-up) Owner ID starts With('00G')
rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.Name = "Follow-up", OR( ISNEW(), PRIORVALUE(OwnerId)<> OwnerId), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Detractor'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate Detractor')), NOT(ISNULL(ParentId )), BEGINS(OwnerId , "00G") )

rules.fullName: 1%2E2 Notify child case owner when user is owner of child case
rules.description: Send Email to Owner of Child Case(Follow-up) Owner id start with '005'
rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.Name = "Follow-up", OR( ISNEW(), PRIORVALUE(OwnerId)<> OwnerId), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Detractor'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate Detractor')), NOT(ISNULL(ParentId )), BEGINS(OwnerId , "005") )

rules.fullName: 1%2E3 Notify case owner%2Fqueue member%2Fcsm account team member on child case escalated
rules.description: Send email to child case owner ,queue member and Account team member having CSM role
rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.Name = "Follow-up", Child_Case_Escalated_Date__c < NOW() , PRIORVALUE(Is_Child_Case_Escalated__c) <>Is_Child_Case_Escalated__c, Is_Child_Case_Escalated__c = TRUE )

rules.fullName: CSM Team Case Closing By CSM Workflow
rules.description: CSM set the status of the case as "Closed". A notification will be sent to the Customer and CSM related to closing of the case.

rules.fullName: CSM Team Case Closing By Customer Workflow
rules.description: CSM closes the case or customer has manually set the status of the case as "Closed". A notification will be sent to the Customer and CSM related to closing of the case.

rules.fullName: Case%3A Dispute Case is Closed
rules.description: Send details to Qualtrics if dispute case is closed.
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Dispute' && Ischanged(Status) && ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed') && NOT(ISNULL( ContactId ))&& NOT(ISNULL(Contact.Email)) && NOT(CONTAINS( Contact.Email, '@ncr.com'))

rules.fullName: Change Status to Submitted
Escalate Case For Detractor Type
rules.description: This workflow will be fire when Detractor Case will not have any action within 120 hours.(Parent Case)
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Close the Loop", ISPICKVAL(Type,'Detractor'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'New') )

rules.fullName: Escalate Case For Immediate Detractor Type
rules.description: This workflow will be fire when Immediate Detractor Case will not have any action within 48 hours.(Parent Case)
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Close the Loop", ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate Detractor'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'New') )

rules.fullName: Escalate Case For Immediate Type
rules.description: This workflow will be fire when Immediate Case will not have any action within 48 hours.(Parent Case)
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Close the Loop", ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'New') )

rules.fullName: First Contact Field Update on Contact Completed
rules.description: First Contact Field Update on Contact Completed

rules.fullName: GLOBAL ENTITLEMENTS%3A Billing Cycle Remaining
Global Entitlements%3A Calculate Months Remaining on Contract
rules.description: Updates field with calculation of Months Remaining on Contact

rules.fullName: HOSPD%3A Support Escalation
rules.description: Sends email to supervisor when Hospitality Namer Direct Subcategory = Support Escalation

rules.fullName: Notify Account And Contact Owner For LOB Financial and Case Type Detractor
rules.description: This workflow is being use to notify Account owner and Contact owner when Case is being create with Detractor type and Account LOB is Financial

rules.fullName: Notify Account And Contact Owner For LOB Financial and Case Type Immediate Detractor
rules.description: This workflow is being use when case is being create with type Immediate Detractor and Account LOB is Financial

rules.fullName: Notify Account Owner For Retail And Hospitality LOB
rules.description: This workflow is being use to notify Account Owner When Immediate case is being create and Account LOB is Retail Or Hospitality.

rules.fullName: Notify Account Owner For Retail And Hospitality LOB and Detractor Case Type
rules.description: This workflow is being use to notify Account Owner When Detractor and Detractor case is being create and Account LOB is Retail Or Hospitality.

rules.fullName: Notify Account Owner For Retail And Hospitality LOB and Immediate Detractor Case Type
rules.description: This workflow is being use when case is being created with type Immediate Detractor and Account LOB id Retail and Hospitality

rules.fullName: Notify Account Owner and Contact Owner For Financial LOB and Immediate Case Type
rules.description: This workflow is being use to notify Account Owner and Contact Owner when Case is being create with case Type Immediate and Account LOB is Financial

rules.fullName: Notify Case Owner of New Case Comments
Notify Child Case Owner And CSM
rules.description: This workflow is basically being use to notify Close The Loop Child Case Owner and CSM after 120 hours if case status is still new after 120 hours.
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Close the Loop Child", ISPICKVAL(Status,'New'))

rules.fullName: Notify Contact Owner For Detractor case Type
rules.description: This Workflow is being use to notify Contact Owner when case is being create with Detractor Type and account LOB is T&T

rules.fullName: Notify Contact Owner For Immediate Detractor case Type
rules.description: This Workflow is being use when case is being created with Immediate Detractor Case Type and Account LOB is T&T

rules.fullName: Notify Contact Owner For Immediate case Type
rules.description: This Workflow is being use to notify Contact owner if Account's LOB is T&T

rules.fullName: Notify Global Entitlements Managers Accenture Case moved to Assess
rules.description: NotifiesTanya Lebron that an Accenture Case has been moved to Assess Status.

rules.fullName: Notify On Due Date Passed
rules.description: This workflow is being used to update is_Due_Date_Passed field, which is being use to notify Case owner and CSM.

rules.fullName: Notify case owner and his%2Fher manager
rules.description: Send Email to Case Owner and His/Her Manager
rules.formula: or ( AND ( RecordType.Name = "Close the Loop", Immediate_Detractor_Case_Escalated_Date__c <NOW(), ISPICKVAL(Status,'New'), or( AND ( PRIORVALUE(Immediate_Detractor_Case_Escalated__c) = FALSE, Immediate_Detractor_Case_Escalated__c=TRUE ), AND(PRIORVALUE(Immediate_Case_Escalated__c) =FALSE, Immediate_Case_Escalated__c = TRUE ) ) ), AND ( RecordType.Name = "Close the Loop", Detractor_Case_Escalated_Date__c <NOW(), ISPICKVAL(Status,'New'), PRIORVALUE(Detractor_Case_Escalated__c)=FALSE, Detractor_Case_Escalated__c=TRUE ) )

rules.fullName: Notify child case owner and account team having csm role on case status other than close
rules.description: Send Email to Child Case owner and CSM on Account team
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Follow-up", NOT(ISNULL(ParentId )), Due_Date__c < NOW(), PRIORVALUE( Is_Due_Date_Passed__c ) <> Is_Due_Date_Passed__c , Is_Due_Date_Passed__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed")))

rules.fullName: Notify parent case owner and account team having csm role on case status close
rules.description: Send email to Parent(Close The Loop) Case Owner and CSM on case Close
rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.Name = "Close the Loop", ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status ,'Closed'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Detractor'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'Immediate Detractor') ) )

rules.fullName: Notify to Customer When CSM Case updates Case Comment
PopulateRorCreatedDate
SFDC Case Closed
rules.description: Workflow rule to send out email that SFDC Global Support Case has been closed.

rules.fullName: Status Change CSM Assigned
rules.description: When any of the CSM assigns the case by changing the ownership to themselves or any other CSM member, then the status of case should be changed to CSM Assigned.
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Customer Success Team Case", BEGINS(OwnerId , "005"), BEGINS(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) , "00G") )

rules.fullName: Update Account Owner Info
Update Contract in CFS for Entitlement Cases
rules.description: This rule will update the contract status in CFS on the Entitlement case page layout.

rules.fullName: VOC Assigned and Notify to Banking CSM Queue%2E
VOC Case Auto Close
VOC Case Resolution By CSM
VOC Reset Closing Date
setMaccCaseStatustoOpen
rules.description: This worflow will set Case status field to open as default when macc chat case created
